ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Otitis Media with Effusion
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Unilateral conductive hearing loss, Type B tympanogram, absent reflexes, and history of allergies with otalgia and fullness.

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess hearing thresholds and determine the type and degree of hearing loss.
To validate pure-tone thresholds and assess speech understanding.
To evaluate middle ear function and tympanic membrane mobility.
To assess the integrity of the acoustic reflex arc and confirm conductive pathology.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: The patient presents with a unilateral right-sided hearing loss. Audiometry reveals a mild-to-moderate conductive hearing loss in the right ear, with a slight sensorineural component at 2000 Hz, while the left ear is normal. Immittance testing shows a flat (Type B) tympanogram in the right ear and absent acoustic reflexes, consistent with middle ear pathology (otitis media) likely secondary to allergies.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Slight sloping to mild conductive loss (250-1000 Hz), slight sensorineural loss at 2000 Hz, sloping to moderate conductive loss (3000-8000 Hz). Left ear: Normal hearing (250-8000 Hz).

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRT: Right 35 dB HL, Left 7 dB HL (consistent with PTA). WRS: Normal bilaterally (100%).

tests.name: Tympanometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Type B (flat). Left ear: Type A (normal).

tests.name: Acoustic reflexes
tests.result_summary: Right ipsilateral and contralateral absent. Left ipsilateral normal; Left contralateral absent. Reflex decay could not be measured.

counseling_actions: Explain the conductive nature of the hearing loss due to fluid behind the eardrum
Discuss the connection between recent allergies and the ear symptoms
Advise on the expected resolution of symptoms with medical treatment

escalation.rationale_short: For medical management of conductive hearing loss and otitis media.

follow_up_plan.objective: To ensure hearing has returned to normal after treatment.
